channel.title: [SRL][RS2] PowerMinerSD - Reposting [~]
channel.description:
Hey Everyone.
Here was my powerminer that was for sale just less than a year ago, but people cracked it back then so GG. It should still work, compiles perfectly with SRL v3.6, simple and does the job.
Attached. Post reports so I can see if it needs an update or not.
Cheers, Surajd.

item.title: [SRL][RS2] PowerMinerSD - Reposting [~]
item.dc:creator: @jamesshaw jamesshaw
item.description:
@jamesshaw wrote:

it looks very nice ill have to start up autoing again soon… try this script out 1st!

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] PowerMinerSD - Reposting [~]
item.dc:creator: @the_scar_noob the scar noob
item.description:
@the_scar_noob wrote:

[quote=“seaking, post:6, topic:67819”]unendless ^^ thats a good one.

Anyways, I didn’t look at the script because it’s Surajd’s, so I assume it works perfectly well. However, if the problems The Scar Noob has mentioned really do exist, there are easy solutions…

  1. If it finds “lol” and replies successfully, a boolean variable gets set to true for 15 seconds. The autoresponder then checks if this boolean is set to true before responding with “lol” again, and if it is, no response is made.

  2. Check the minimap for other white dots a given distance from the center (where you stand)…[/quote]

  3. infinite loop, sorry i’m not great at enlgish

  4. Did i said that there ren’t any solutions? i knew that…

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] PowerMinerSD - Reposting [~]
item.dc:creator: @seaking seaking
item.description:
@seaking wrote:

unendless ^^ thats a good one.

Anyways, I didn’t look at the script because it’s Surajd’s, so I assume it works perfectly well. However, if the problems The Scar Noob has mentioned really do exist, there are easy solutions…

  1. If it finds “lol” and replies successfully, a boolean variable gets set to true for 15 seconds. The autoresponder then checks if this boolean is set to true before responding with “lol” again, and if it is, no response is made.

  2. Check the minimap for other white dots a given distance from the center (where you stand)…

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] PowerMinerSD - Reposting [~]
item.dc:creator: @the_scar_noob the scar noob
item.description:
@the_scar_noob wrote:

cool, but for example with that responder if it finds lol in the chatbox it’ll type lol, right?
but than it finds lol again, the one you typed, so it’s going to type lol again, right?
… unendless loop??
And also the ghostspeak, i wont prefer that, it also speaks about mining things when you’re alone or when nowone talks.
Also when someone responds on that, you wont answer…

Don’t think i’m attacking you, i just give me opinion and i wanne be sure if i’m right or wrong.

The scar Noob.

Read full topic
